text: Yolanda Hadid and David Foster ’ s divorce is getting uglier. Reportedly, the music producer doesn ’ t want to pay spousal support to his soon to be ex - wife. SHOULD David Foster wind up at the piano during his upcoming nuptials to Katharine McPhee, it wouldn ’ t be the first time he performed at a wedding of hers. While celebrating her first marriage to Nick Cokas in February 2008, McPhee serenaded Cokas with a rendition of Nat King Cole and Natalie Cole ’ s Unforgettable at their lavish wedding reception, with Grammy - winning producer Foster on the keys, People reported this week, resurfacing a photo of the performance. In May 2014, McPhee filed for divorce from Cokas
